en: If it had not been Jehovah who was on our side, Let Israel now say,
hmr: “Eini tienga ṭhang chu LALPA ni naw sien chu,” Israelhaiin ti raw se.

en: If it had not been Jehovah who was on our side, When men rose up against us;
hmr: “Mihaiin an mi thaw lai khan, Eini tienga ṭhang chu LALPA ni naw sienla chu;

en: Then they had swallowed us up alive, When their wrath was kindled against us:
hmr: Kha lai khan anni chun ei hring pumin mi lem tâng an tih, Ei chunga an lung a chawk lai khan:

en: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, The stream had gone over our soul;
hmr: Kha lai ngei khan tuihai chun mi chîm tlum tâng an ta, Vadung chun ei hringna hi vurhmang tâng a tih;

en: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
hmr: Kha lai ngei khan tui chapo chun ei hringna hi vur hmang tâng a ta,

en: Blessed be Jehovah, Who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
hmr: Sase anga se dinga an haa mi pe nâwtu, LALPA chu inpâkin um raw se.

en: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: The snare is broken, and we are escaped.
hmr: Châng kamtu chânga vate a suok angin ei hringna hi a suok tah a, Châng chu a se tah a, eini hi ei suok ta hlau a nih.

en: Our help is in the name of Jehovah, Who made heaven and earth.
hmr: Eini mi ṭhangpuina ding chu, LALPA hnuoi le vân siemtu hmingah a um,” tiin.
